# servicesMenu

**Instance Property**

The app’s Services menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var servicesMenu: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the app’s Services menu or `nil` if that menu has not been created. You can assign a new value to the property to set the Services menu for your app.

## Managing the Services Menu

- **registerServicesMenuSendTypes(_:returnTypes:)**: Registers the pasteboard types the receiver can send and receive in response to service requests.
